translation.text: Airport & South Line, Bankstown Line - Delays

Flow on delays are being experienced due to a Police operation at Westmead. Please listen to announcements and check transport apps as some stopping patterns and departure platforms may change at short notice.
Inner West & Leppington Line, North Shore Line, Northern Line - Major delays

Major delays and service gaps continue to be experienced to and from the City due to a police operation at Westmead. 
Police are on site attending to the issue. 
Please allow plenty of additional travel time, listen to announcements, check information screens and transport apps 
as stopping patterns and departure platforms may change at short notice.
Blue Mountains Line, Cumberland Line, Western Line - Partial Closure

Train services have been suspended in both directions on the T1 Western, Blue Mountains and Cumberland Lines due to a Police operation at Westmead. 

A limited shuttle train service is in operation between Blacktown and Richmond, Penrith and Emu Plains as wells as between Parramata, Central and Hornsby via the North Shore Line. A very limited bus service is now in operation between Blacktown and Parramatta in both directions. You are advised to avoid any non-essential travel at this time or if you must travel to allow plenty of additional travel time.

As an alternative you may wish to utilise local bus routes 661, 700, 705, 706 which operate from Parramatta to Blacktown.

Please listen to announcements, check station information screens and transport apps for updates and information.

Wollongong due to a medical emergency at Hurstville earlier. Please change at Wollongong for the following service travelling towards Kiama.

This service has been diverted to travel Lidcombe via Regents Park then Cabramatta due to a police operation at Westmead. You may need to change at Lidcombe or Cabramatta to complete your journey. Please allow additional travel time.
This service will travel Hornsby via Epping stopping Hornsby then all stations to Strathfield due to a police operation at Westmead. Please allow additional travel time.
An escalator between platforms 1 & 2 and the concourse is temporarily out of service. Please use the nearby escalator. If you require assistance, please ask staff or call 9379 4843.
The west car park lift is temporarily out of service. For assistance, please see station staff or call 9765 1166.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 2 & 3 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or call 9563 7273.
The lift between platforms 1/2 and Kiora road is temporarily out of service.  If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9522 1295.
The lift between the concourse and platform 1 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 4223 5616.
The lift between the footbridge and platform 2 is temporarily out of service. For assistance, please see staff or contact 4780 3817.
The lift between the footbridge and Wilson Way is temporarily out of service. For assistance, please see staff or call 4739 1620.
Station Update - Canterbury, Dulwich Hill, Hurlstone Park and more
Due to Metro construction works, platforms have a reduced capacity. Please avoid standing in front of the construction zones and remain behind the yellow line on the platforms.
Station Update - Bexley North, Birrong, Redfern
Due to station redevelopment work some platforms have reduced capacity. Please avoid standing in front of construction zones and remain behind the yellow line on the platform

Ongoing until 30 June some stairs between the station and the street level will close for upgrade works. During this time follow the signs and staff directions to the nearest available stairs. If you need further assistance, see station staff or call 93794110.

The stairs from Richardsons Crescent to concourse will be closed for maintenance work until November 2021. Access to platforms 2 and 3 will now be via platform 1 side entrance (off carpark on Richardsons Crescent). Entrance from Griffiths St will not be affected.

There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may mean using different stairs, escalators and lifts. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6049959
During station upgrade works this week, access to Platform 1 is not available via Shirley Rd. You can access the platform via Shirley Lane from Milner Crescent.

A new Metro concourse is being constructed on the northern end of Sydenham Station. 
While the concourse is being installed, please use the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. 
If you need help, please ask staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
